page.title: 08WINCANTON DIARY-CLAIRE 11yrs
page.content: I{awoke}at 7.30.I had Sugar Puffs for breakfast.I started walking to school. I went to Marshes to buy some tuck and shandy.I got to{school}at 9.I was five minutes late.Some of the 3rd year boys were going to{Yeovilton Naval Air Base They came back to school at about 2 pm I{came out}of school at about 3.35. I got home at 4. I went to Chapel Press for some paper.I had savoury mince for {tea,}then went outside to{play}with my friend Claire Tomkins. We took Beautie (a dog) for a walk across the fields. We were gone \ hour.We played{football when we got home,until 7, when we took out my rabbit and Claire's guinea pig. At 7.30 I went in to watch{television I like Horror films.Mum came home at \ past eight.I made mum,dad and me a cup of{tea.} We settled down to watch tv. I went to{bed}at about 9.45.{ {
